subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In the days before the Kentucky Derby, officials will have 24-hour security surveillance of the 20 Derby horses in an attempt to restore confidence in a sport damaged by widespread drug culture.
snippet: In the days before the Kentucky Derby, officials will have 24-hour security surveillance of the 20 Derby horses in an attempt to restore confidence in a sport damaged by widespread drug culture.
